roleset.name: to prevent from happening

example.name: transitive
example.text: Such news is good for bonds because economic weakness sometimes causes [the Federal Reserve]-1 to lower interest rates in an effort [*]-1 to stimulate the economy and stave off a recession .

roleset.note: STAVE_OFF-V NOTES: Frames file for 'stave' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from stave.01-v predicate notes)
